short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace every mention of the GOP with their new acronym, GQP.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Republicans clearly defined themselves as the Grand QAnon Party by overwhelmingly voting to shield a dangerous QAnon conspiracy theorist like Majorie Taylor Greene.

We're just helping them rebrand.
